name: Escape the Party
description:
Escape the Party was made on the California Zephyr, in between Chicago and San Francisco, during the #trainjam2016. Game art, music, programming, and soul provided by:

  • Cherry Cupid (@Cherry_Cupid)
  • John Engesser (@McJohnArt)
  • Elias Farhan (@kraklegrand)
  • Lindar Greenwood (@lindarthebard)
  • Abdullah Hamed (@indiesaudi)
  • Andrei Marks (@andreimarks)
  • Ghaida Zahran (@GhaidaZahran)
